Introduction
This topic contains information on reducing DIC for an incarcerated surviving spouse, including
right of a child(ren) to an apportionment when the surviving spouse is incarcerated
determining the effective date of an apportionment of DIC due to incarceration
, and
determining the amount of DIC to apportion to a child(ren)
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C - Incarceration of Dependents and Certain Survivors
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
